library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(recipes)
library(corrplot)
library(GGally)
url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pinkocto/mm/main/posts/2_Research/SOLAR/solar_radiation.csv'
df = read_csv(url)
Rows: 803000 Columns: 3
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (2): region, date
dbl (1): solar_radiation

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
df = df |> mutate(date=ymd_hm(date))
df%>%colnames
  1. 'region'
  2. 'solar_radiation'
  3. 'date'
df <- df %>%
          group_by(region) %>%
          mutate(row = row_number()) %>%
          tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = region, values_from = solar_radiation) %>%
          select(-row)
head(df)

num_vars <- df %>% select(-date)
weight <- cor(num_vars)
